sn37.29:1.4: Rupabalena ca, bhikkhave, matugamo samannagato hoti, na ca bhogabalena—
sn37.29:1.6: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, matugamo rupabalena ca samannagato hoti, bhogabalena ca—
sn37.29:1.8: Rupabalena ca, bhikkhave, matugamo samannagato hoti, bhogabalena ca, na ca natibalena—
sn37.29:1.10: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, matugamo rupabalena ca samannagato hoti, bhogabalena ca, natibalena ca—
sn37.29:1.12: Rupabalena ca, bhikkhave, matugamo samannagato hoti, bhogabalena ca, natibalena ca, na ca puttabalena—
sn37.29:1.14: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, matugamo rupabalena ca samannagato hoti, bhogabalena ca, natibalena ca, puttabalena ca—
sn37.29:1.16: Rupabalena ca, bhikkhave, matugamo samannagato hoti, bhogabalena ca, natibalena ca, puttabalena ca, na ca silabalena—
sn37.29:1.18: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, matugamo rupabalena ca samannagato hoti, bhogabalena ca, natibalena ca, puttabalena ca, silabalena ca—
sn37.29:1.20: Imani kho, bhikkhave, panca matugamassa balani”ti.
